name: Black Diamond Nut Tool
description: Avoid the wrath of your second; hand them this nut tool to clean out the protection you placed on the way up. Very lightweight, yet rigid enough to avoid bending. Has a notched end to pound out nuts as well as a hook for grabbing errant cables and triggers. The end is a useful bottle opener.Cut-out holes throughout body keep this tool lightweight.Made of steel for durability.
